About Yorushika

Yorushika is a talented artist whose music has made a significant impact on my listening experience. With 46 tracks in my collection across 15 different albums, Yorushika has consistently delivered memorable and engaging music. The artist's work spans multiple genres including Rock, J-Pop, showcasing versatility and artistic range. With a total of 4604 plays, these tracks have become an integral part of my music library.
